incidents.title: RESOLVED: We are investigating elevated error rates with multiple products in us-east1
incidents.message: Incident began at 2025-07-18 07:42 and ended at 2025-07-18 09:47 (all times are US/Pacific ). # Incident Report ## Summary On Friday, 18 July 2025 07:50 US/Pacific, several Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Google Workspace (GWS) products experienced elevated latencies and error rates in the us-east1 region for a duration of up to 1 hour and 57 minutes. GCP Impact Duration: 18 July 2025 07:50 - 09:47 US/Pacific : 1 hour 57 minutes GWS Impact Duration: 18 July 2025 07:50 - 08:40 US/Pacific : 50 min
affected_products: Pause non-critical workflows until safety controls are implemented (complete).
Strengthen safety controls for hardware upgrade workflows by end of Q3 2025.
Design and implement a mechanism to prevent control plane partitioning in case of dual failure of upstream routers by end of Q4 2025.

incidents.title: Shai-Hulud 2.0 Supply Chain Incident – No Customer Impact
incidents.message: Nov 26 , 00:00 UTC Resolved - Informational (No Customer Action Required) Deepgram identified that our internal development environment was affected as part of the industry-wide Shai-Hulud 2.0 NPM supply chain attack. The attack used compromised NPM packages to inject malicious CI/CD workflows and attempt to exfiltrate internal development credentials. Our investigation confirms: - No access to customer data or databases - No impact to production API infrastructure or service availability - No m

incidents.title: Public REST API outage
incidents.message: Status: Resolved The Cloudflare outage issue has been resolved. All our services and APIs are operating normally. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for your patience.

incidents.title: CRUD endpoint outage
incidents.message: Nov 14 , 03:03 UTC Resolved - The playground should be back up. The playground outage was downstream of a more general outage on CRUD endpoints caused by a database issue which is now resolved. Thanks to previous infra hardening efforts, this issue did not affect production traffic on our real-time APIs, including TTS & STT. Nov 14 , 02:29 UTC Investigating - The Cartesia playground is currently down. We are investigating.

incidents.title: Elevated latency and connection timeouts on Deepgram services

incidents.title: EU Specific Route 404

Nov 10 , 07:58 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. Nov 10 , 07:55 UTC Monitoring - We've deployed a fix for the route. Nov 10 , 07:53 UTC Identified - As part of a scheduled node migration, the EU specific domain was routed to a new node. This appears to not be working as intended, we're deploying a fix shortly.

incidents.title: Database connection issue leading to impacted Agents and Narrations
incidents.message: Nov 6 , 19:38 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Nov 6 , 19:38 UTC Monitoring - Root cause was determined to be an unforeseen networking configuration change from an upstream provider. Mitigations have been applied, all errors are resolved, and we’re closely monitoring the system. Nov 6 , 19:16 UTC Investigating - We are experiencing some database connection issues impacting some product service area including Agents and Narrations. These do not impact TTS, Voice or Cloning APIs.

Oct 9 , 23:00 UTC Investigating - We're seeing elevated error rates with OpenAI models in the Voice Agent API. Our team is actively investigating and working with OpenAI to find a path to resolution, and a path to mitigation in the short term. Our metrics show degraded service for 4o-mini, 4.1-mini, 4.1 nano, 4.1, and possibly other OpenAI models. A service degradation began at approx

incidents.title: [ISP Network-Related Issue]
incidents.message: Oct 7 , 17:18 UTC Resolved - Start: 16:15:00 UTC End: 17:18:00 UTC Streaming connectivity issues from some AWS regions may have caused Websocket failures errors and degraded connectivity

incidents.title: US Network Issues
incidents.message: Oct 3 , 04:30 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 3 , 01:51 UTC Monitoring - The issue has been mitigated after rerouting traffic to avoid upstream network provider failures. Networking errors may have occurred intermittently between 12:08 am UTC and 1:51 am UTC. Oct 3 , 00:08 UTC Identified - We've identified an issue with an upstream network provider across various US regions, and are working to shift traffic to alternative routes.

incidents.title: PVC creation outage
incidents.message: Oct 1 , 21:05 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 1 , 20:13 UTC Monitoring - We've implemented a fix to the pipeline, and we're actively monitoring. Users can re-try any failed Pro Voice Clones to re-train them. Oct 1 , 18:42 UTC Identified - We've identified the issue and are currently testing a hotfix. Oct 1 , 18:26 UTC Investigating - We are experiencing an issue where all PVC creations are failing. We are actively looking into this issue.

incidents.title: Elevated API Errors for STT and TTS
incidents.message: Sep 24 , 13:02 UTC Resolved - Streaming and batch STT and TTS requests experienced elevated error rates due to connectivity issues in one of our regions that caused services to stop and not restart as expected. The issue has been resolved, and current status of the Deepgram API is operational. Sep 24 , 09:09 UTC Investigating - We're experiencing an elevated level of API errors for streaming and batch STT and batch TTS - are currently looking into the issue.

incidents.title: Elevated errors on TTS requests for sonic-2
incidents.message: Sep 18 , 13:00 UTC Resolved - A recent deployment introduced regressions affecting a subset of text-to-speech (TTS) requests using the latest sonic-2 model ID, including the dated variants sonic-2-2025-05-08 and sonic-2-2025-06-11. Between 1:00–1:30 pm UTC, impacted requests experienced elevated API error rates. The issue was isolated to the affected model IDs and did not impact other TTS models. The incident has been resolved.

incidents.title: Exports failing in Narrations
incidents.message: Sep 18 , 03:44 UTC Resolved - This incident, which was caused by an inconsistency in how the Bun JS runtime handles multipart file uploads containing JS Blob objects, has been resolved. Sep 17 , 22:06 UTC Investigating - We are currently investigating export failures in Narrations.

incidents.title: Login/sign-up degraded on playground
incidents.message: Sep 17 , 20:44 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sep 17 , 07:22 UTC Identified - Playground sign-in/sign-up is currently degraded due to an outage in our auth provider, Clerk. For updates, see status.clerk.com.

incidents.title: Elevated batch error rates
incidents.message: Sep 5 , 07:07 UTC Resolved - Elevated error rates were observed for requests that submitted a URL to an input audio file or used callbacks to collect the response, primarily affecting STT batch requests. Sep 5 , 04:00 UTC Investigating - We are currently investigating elevated error rates returned from STT batch requests.

incidents.title: TTS and STT traffic affected due to NA cluster instability
incidents.message: Sep 4 , 20:44 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sep 4 , 20:39 UTC Update - All NA cluster traffic has stabilized. We continue to monitor and will share the upstream provider’s RCA on the network instability. We'll put appropriate mitigations in place once we have this update. Sep 4 , 20:21 UTC Update - We've put a mitigation in place and traffic is coming back to the cluster. We're continuing to monitor. Sep 4 , 20:10 UTC Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.title: [Deepgram API] Aura-2 TTS Performance Degradation
incidents.message: Sep 4 , 17:09 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sep 4 , 16:22 UTC Investigating - We are investigating an issue where a subset of requests may return elevated rates of 5XX errors or experience significantly higher time to first byte.

incidents.title: ISP Network-Related Issue
incidents.message: Sep 4 , 14:50 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sep 4 , 14:43 UTC Investigating - We are investigating an issue that may result in callback failures and timeouts.

incidents.title: [Deepgram API] Aura-2 TTS Performance Degradation
incidents.message: Aug 27 , 20:50 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Aug 27 , 19:56 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. incidents.title: ISP Network-Related Issue
incidents.message: Aug 26 , 18:25 UTC Resolved - Time: ~ 06:30 UTC - 07:00 UTC Summary: Streaming connectivity issues causing 'timed out during opening handshake' errors and degraded connectivity. Service is now stable. This has been resolved and root cause discovered.

incidents.title: 503 Errors on TTS/STT traffic in NA
incidents.message: Aug 25 , 01:00 UTC Resolved - Between 6:04:56 PM and 6:05:36 PM PDT (40 second period) on Aug 24th 2025, our NA cluster experienced instability due to a networking problem from an upstream provider. This caused 503 errors on new requests and WebSocket connections for TTS and STT traffic in North America.

incidents.title: Cloudflare Outage in IAD
incidents.message: Aug 21 , 20:04 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Aug 21 , 20:04 UTC Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue. Aug 21 , 19:07 UTC Identified - https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/ Cloudflare is experiencing an outage in IAD that has impacted network performance leading to instability with requests in our US East region. We're continuing to monitor.

incidents.title: Degraded performance in US
incidents.message: Aug 15 , 13:59 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Our cluster provider had a network outage and has recovered. We are monitoring the cluster and working with the provider to RCA the issue. Aug 15 , 13:57 UTC Monitoring - Between 6:40 am PT -> 6:43 am PT, we observed degraded performance in the US cluster. All systems are operational now. We are monitoring.

incidents.title: [Voice Agent API] Connections Rejected
incidents.message: Aug 14 , 15:13 UTC Resolved - Between 2025-08-14 21:13 UTC and 2025-08-14 21:37 UTC, the Voice Agent API experienced a 20-minute outage that prevented all new connections from being established. Existing active connections were not impacted. The issue has been resolved, and current status of the Voice Agent API is operational.

incidents.title: Degraded performance in EU
incidents.message: Aug 11 , 17:45 UTC Resolved - We noticed a spike in load in the EU, which may have caused elevated latencies briefly. Our alerting system flagged this spike and we scaled our EU cluster to handle it. Latencies should be back to normal.

incidents.title: NA Cluster Instability
incidents.message: Jul 24 , 21:32 UTC Resolved - Seems we've been fine for an hour, closing. RCA coming shortly Jul 24 , 20:34 UTC Monitoring - We've rolled over 100% of traffic to the new cluster. Monitoring now Jul 24 , 18:44 UTC Identified - We haven't had a latency spike in a while but we're sporadically seeing workers be unavailable, reducing our capacity.
